评论详情: Overall top as described and as seen in pictures.  If  you are in between sizes, size up.  Does come very wrinkled, I used a steamer, and the wrinkles came out easily.
Nice shirt. Not light weight at all. Runs larger than most Amazon shirts. I had to go down a size and it's still roomy
I ordered a size small.  This shirt is HUGE!!!!  This small is more like a XXXXlarge!!!!!
Blouse is well made, colorful and comfortable.
Loved the shirt, just runs smaller than expected.
I wish I had known it was long.  It would have been better shorter.
The fabric is soft and the embroidery is not itchy at all.
Order 2 sizes up because these run very small & have no give in the fabric. Embroidery is nice though.
The top is really pretty but runs very large. I got a small and it came to mid thigh and it was very baggy.
